*  **Read_PerLSData_Optimized.py** is a script to read SQLite tables generated by https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/blob/master/DQMServices/Components/scripts/dqmiodatasetharvest.py, it dumps the content to csv format in bunches of 100k rows
*  **DumpSingleHistogram.py** is a script to dump a single histogram to a csv file
